Register.attendanceDescription: The conference will focus on updating knowledge and improving skills in caring for premature and low birth weight infants receiving Kangaroo Mother Care (KMC) - a method that has been proven to reduce mortality and morbidity among premature and low- birth-weight infants. The conference is honored to welcome clinical experts and researchers from many countries around the world to share valuable experiences as well as the latest research results on this method of care. In addition, the conference will promote the need for widespread application of the KMC in the regional medical community.

WelcomeMessage.title: WELCOME MESSAGE
WelcomeMessage.subtitle: The Third regional conference of Asia-Oceania network of Kangaroo Mother Care
WelcomeMessage.salutation: Dear Distinguished Delegates, Esteemed Experts, and Honored Guests,
WelcomeMessage.intro: It is with great pleasure that we welcome you to the third Regional Conference of the Asia-Oceania Network of Kangaroo Mother Care, held in Da Nang City - a place where the breathtaking beauty of nature meets the modern and vibrant pulse of a youthful central Vietnamese metropolis. With its pristine white-sand beaches and crystal-clear waters, Da Nang is proud to host this meaningful gathering of professionals dedicated to improving neonatal care.
WelcomeMessage.slogan: This year’s conference carries a powerful message: “Immediate and Continuous Kangaroo Mother Care – Nurture small babies for healthier futures.”
WelcomeMessage.paragraph1: Kangaroo Mother Care has been widely recognized as an effective, integrated approach to caring for preterm and low birth weight infants. It significantly reduces neonatal mortality, enhances overall development, and strengthens the emotional bond between mother and baby.
WelcomeMessage.paragraph2: This conference presents a valuable opportunity for leading regional and international experts in obstetrics, neonatology and pediatrics to come together. It serves as a respected scientific forum to share the latest research evidence, exchange practical clinical experiences, and promote collaboration. Our shared goal is to expand the sustainable implementation of KMC across all levels of healthcare - from tertiary hospitals to local facilities - while building a strong professional network to ensure a healthier future for children throughout the region.
WelcomeMessage.closing: We wish all delegates good health, great success, and a memorable experience in the warm and welcoming city of Da Nang!
WelcomeMessage.signatureRole: Chairman of Da Nang Medical Association
